channel.title: GitHub Makefile Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of Makefile in GitHub

item.title: jobbole/awesome-python-cn
item.description: Python资源大全中文版，包括：Web框架、网络爬虫、模板引擎、数据库、数据可视化、图片处理等，由伯乐在线持续更新。

item.title: openwrt/packages
item.description: Community maintained packages for OpenWrt. Documentation for submitting pull requests is in CONTRIBUTING.md

item.title: seebi/dircolors-solarized
item.description: This is a repository of themes for GNU ls (configured via GNU dircolors) that support Ethan Schoonover’s Solarized color scheme.

item.title: Naereen/badges
item.description: 📝 Markdown code for lots of small badges 🎀 📌 (shields.io, forthebadge.com etc) 😎. Contributions are welcome! Please add yourse!

item.title: ninenines/erlang.mk
item.description: A build tool for Erlang that just works.

item.title: servicemesher/istio-handbook
item.description: Istio Service Mesh Advanced Practical - Istio服务网格进阶实战 https://www.servicemesher.com/istio-handbook/
